translations: n.仪式；典礼；礼节；客套（ceremony 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.
These ancient ceremonies propitiate the spirits of the waters.
sentences.translation: 这些古老的仪式平息水中神灵的怒气。

sentences.sentence: The general secretary may represent the president at official ceremonies.
sentences.translation: 秘书长可以在官方仪式上代表主席。
